channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Drain is blocked forcing water onto road surface, 10th December
item.description:
Drain is blocked causing water to travel on road surface down Bushcombe Lane. This will lead to severe icing issues when the weather becomes colder.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bushcombe Close, Woodmancote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bad road surface outside Springbank view, 9th December
item.description:
There have been some roadworks there for some weeks. These have now been cleared, but the road leading through them, and before them is badly pitted with uneven road, surface potholes and rough edges.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Badly repaired, uneven, potholed and wheel damaging Road surface, 9th December
item.description:
There has been some roadworks there for some weeks, but they have now gone and left a very bad area where people and swerving to dodge potholes, et cetera
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayden Road, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: All the cats eyes have been removed and have left holes were our tyres are now being directed, 9th December
item.description:
All up this road (B4063) from the junction of “Down Hatherley Lane” to “Town Cars” on the edge of Churchdown, with a mixture of potholes, sink drain covers and rough road surfaces
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: It's big, thought I'd damaged a wheel, 9th December
item.description:
About 50m from the roundabout
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Albert Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: RoW sign on its post has been pushed into the hedge and is now out of sight, 9th December
item.description:
RoW sign on its post has been pushed into the hedge and is now out of sight. Please note: Your RoW map shows the RoW meeting the road at a hedge. There's with no possibility of scrambling through. The hidden sign is by the gateway a few metres towards the railway bridge. I thought that was the correct place for the RoW: is your map wrong?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Prescott, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole around rattling manhole cover A435 Cleeve Bypass, 9th December
item.description:
Southbound carriageway of the A435 Bishops Cleeve Bypass near the pathway that connects to Meadoway.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, 9th December
item.description:
The whole of Butts Lane is riddled with potholes.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Butt's Lane, Woodmancote, Tewkesbury

item.title: Two potholes on College Lawn near junction with Sandford Road, 9th December
item.description:
Both potholes are a danger to cyclists and are getting bigger by the week.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, College Lawn, Tivoli, Cheltenham

item.title: Trench type pot hole at the exit of Keynsham Road on to Sandford Road, 9th December
item.description:
Trench type pot hole at the exit of Keynsham Road on to Sandford Road causing uncomfortable lurching of car when exiting Keynsham Road. This road is regularly used by GCC Fire Brigade from the Lido Fire Station.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, College Lawn, Tivoli, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned vehicles, 9th December
item.description:
Large van with caravan attached abandoned since the start of November. Blocks neighbour reversing out of drive which makes it difficult for him to reverse out and a potential accident.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Whittington Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mud and building rubbish strewn across verge and road, 9th December
item.description:
Verge has been cut up by vehicles and mud strewn over road. In icy weather the road will be dangerous. Verge is impassable to pedestrians due to mud caused by builders’ vehicles. General waste, and pallets left on verge.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rushley Lane, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drainage issue persistent as there are no local drains. Cars coming past often splash residents at 148 Hewlett Road as they get into their cars, 9th December
item.description:
From 154 Hewlett Road to Ariel Lodge Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 148, Hewlett Road, Whaddon, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Streetlight not working at entrance of Butterfield Court, 8th December
item.description:
The street light at the entrance to Butterfield Court, Bishops Cleeve, by the flats, has not been working for some months now. Could you arrange for it to be fixed please? There are only two lights on Butterfield Court and it is dark without it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1,2,3,4,5,6, Butterfield Court, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
